name: Junkyard (armond_rivera)
description:
Make it through the malfunctioning ship.

Use arrow keys to move.

Collect as many fuel cans as you can while going through the ship.

Design process:

  • While designing levels some doors would go through the walls and I would have to determine how far each would travel so that I could adjust their position and keep them from appearing detached from the walls.
  • One major change during this project was when I wanted to create heat seeking mines, but I kept having trouble with getting them to follow the ship so I decided to get rid of them.
  • When play testing took place the levels felt empty, this is what lead to me putting in fuel canisters to collect in each level.
